me.andrew28.addons.conquer.api

Interface PowerHolder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConquerFaction, ConquerPlayer, FOFaction, FOPlayer, FUFaction, FUPlayer, LFFaction, LFPlayer, MSFaction, MSPlayer, SFFaction, SFPlayer

    public interface PowerHolder
    Represents something that can hold power

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getMaximumPower()
      Gets the maximum amount of power possible.
      double getPower()
      Gets the amount of power
      double getPowerBoost()
      Gets the power boost amount
      void setPower(double power)
      Sets the amount of power
      void setPowerBoost(double powerBoost)
      Sets the power boost amount

    • Method Detail

        double getPower()
        Gets the amount of power
        Returns:
        the amount of power

      • setPower

        void setPower(double power)
        Sets the amount of power
        Parameters:
        power - the new amount of power

      • getMaximumPower

        double getMaximumPower()
        Gets the maximum amount of power possible. getPower() <= getMaximumPower() should always evaluate to true.
        Returns:
        the maximum amount of power possible

      • getPowerBoost

        double getPowerBoost()
        Gets the power boost amount
        Returns:
        the power boost amount

        Parameters:
